Pass on this game. Good concept but really poor execution. Players disconnect constantly, which instantly imbalances/ruins the game. Poor servers cause horrendous wait times and certain perks become lagy, unusable, and frustrating. Every update seems to make the gameplay worse and worse. Player hit boxes are ridiculously bad. Fun 3/10. Frustration 11/10.

Após 1 mês de jogo resolvi refazer minha análise sobre o jogo, e ao invés de mudar de opinião, tudo que ocorreu foi o agravar do que eu ja pensava. Vou listar problemas encontrados no jogo:
- Mal otimizado
- Matchmaking mal feito (um dos piores que já vi)
- Crashs frequentes, forçando o jogador a tentar jogar as vezes por 3 vezes seguidas até parar de crashar, constantemente o jogo "para de responder" e isso é sempre ao decorrer da partida, muita das vezes no inicio delas.
- Jogadores extremamente tóxicos
- Bugs incontáveis
- Lag na partida
- Demora para achar partidas, as vezes você terá de esperar 5 minutos ou mais para achar uma partida, isso se não ocorrer algum erro listado acima e você ter que tentar tudo do 0.
- Jogo mercenário, você compra 10% do jogo, o resto só com DLC. 
- Killers que irão camperar o gancho, não deixando você ser resgatado até que morra no gancho, não dando nenhuma opção de saída, consequentemente, diversão.
- Sistema de ranks é horrível, você começa no rank 20 e pode ir até o rank 1 (máximo), para passar de um rank para o outro são necessários os "pips" que você ganha alcançando objetivos na partida, o que é extremamente bugado, uma vez que em algumas partidas você faz 2-3 geradores, resgate sobreviventes do gancho e ainda assim perde pip e cai de rank, e um colega que esteja jogando junto mesmo fazendo menos objetivos e participações ganha. 

Resumindo: É um jogo que tem tudo para dar certo mas não recebe investimento apropriado, é repleto de bugs, jogadores tóxicos te xingando de tudo que é possível em espanhol e você se aborrece mais do que se diverte. Arrependido da compra.

Dead By Daylight est un jeu vraiment prenant , un jeu sympa surtout entre amis en tant que survivant que seul en tueur quand le besoin de se défouler se fait entendre ... si je devais parler du positif et négatif je dirais ceci.

-positif : 
.Nous avons la possibilité de jouer les nouveaux DLC en avance grace au PTB (serveur test) gratuitement .
.Nous pouvons acheter des tueur/survivant sans forcément besoin de payer pour de vrai (à voir dans le jeu).
.Nous pouvons personnaliser nos personnages favoris avec des "skins"
.il ne coûte pas cher ce qui est un très bon point (20 euros).
.Atmosphère Creepy et screamer au rendez vous.
.Comme le dit la description vous ne tomberez jamais sur la même partie que ce soit carte / coffre / totem / générateur.
.En tant que survivant vous pouvez jouer en team en invitant vos amis via steam ou sur le jeu directement .
.Des tutos sont présents pour vous familiariser (même si beaucoup de gens les négligents..).
.Le jeu possède beaux graphismes agréable à regarder (quand on ne se fait pas poursuivre ^^).
.Outils variés des deux côtés .
.Un crossplateforme est activé nous pouvons donc croiser des joueurs PS4/XBOX one dans nos games. 

Passons maintenant aux négatifs car comme dans tous jeux il y a des mauvais points.

-négatif :
.Le temps de recherche pour trouver une partie est assez longue selon l'heure à laquelle on joue (10Min environs MAX).
.La communauté très toxique en partie comme en chat (malheureusement les pires sont : Français ou Russes).
.Le Jeu ne fait rien pour éviter le cancer dans les games (Camping/tunnel/slugh/camp hatch).
.Il y a Beaucoup de joueurs jouent cancer et restes impunis..
.La hit box (distance à laquelle le tueur peut vous frapper) est mal codée car elle traverse les fenêtres et certaines pallettes.
.Les bugs sont assez courants (compétences non activées EX : Atterissage équilibré / drôlement ne s'activant pas).
.Le Côté "gore" à revoir car souvent répétitif pour un jeu d'horreur.
.Le support ne vous aide pas vraiment quand vous avez un problème..
.Les teams adverses sont trop cancer en utilisant les bugs mais si le tueur fait de même il se fait insulter.

En conclusion , si je devrais être pour ou contre je m'en remet à vous le conseillais tout de même car j'aime énormément ce jeu qui est quand même attractif [Surtout avec vos amis] peu cher / souvent en promotion . il est marrant tout en étant flippant (quelques souris on voler de mon bureau pour un screamer ^^'). Enfin il est toujours en constant développement ce qui est excitant de savoir que du nouveau contenu arrive au fur et a mesure que ce soit DLC/Musique/style de Jeu/carte les mises à jour de ce jeu nous donnes envies d'y jouer une fois la Mise à jour terminée !

Mais s'il vous plait calmer cette connerie de communauté y'en a marre..

Okay, so after around 75 hours I've changed my mind about this game. It's good IN THEORY but it's incredibly flawed past that. Firstly, the emblems system is complete dogshit. The devs expect you to do everything in order to pip or double pip. I once almost got max bloodpoints in a single round (32,000) and I STILL only got 1 pip. And don't even get me started about the campers and tunnelers. They ruin the experience. The devs say it's fine because the other people in the match get generators done but half the time you can facecamp and kill 2 people, let the rest go, and still pip. And then there's the hitboxes...You can get hit from 2 feet away, at 90 PING. Okay then. This game could be so good but the devs are just...terrible.

The state of the game is at an average level, and definitely needs to have better servers.

4.5.0 is the rock bottom point for the game. The devs decided to implement a new HUD and new animations despite overwhelmingly negative feedback from their player base. The devs do not listen to player feedback and have their own agendas. The health of the game is piss poor, each patch introducing new bugs on top of the ones that have been around for years. BHVR is only interested in cheap ways to make money and not the overall state of the game. It is unsustainable. I strongly urge you to find another game to play. After so much time wasted in this game I think it is time to move on.

Adoro jogar esse jogo, mas passo mais tempo tendo que reiniciar o jogo com problemas de loading infinito na criação do lobby, do que de fato jogando o game. Isso torna a experiencia do game frustrante. Não são todas as pessoas que passam por isso mas a maioria dos meus amigos e eu sofremos com esse problema. 
Apesar de tudo é um game que por mais que seja "repetitivo" a cada partida é uma experiencia unica com varias pessoas diferentes, por isso recomendo o game.

Game's fun.

Game starts out fun when you're first learning. Once you get up into higher ranks you start to realize the main flaw. The game does not come with voice chat.   It was designed that way but unfortunately entire teams of players exploit that by using discord to cheat.  This creates a severe imbalance against killers. Watch some "SWF"videos on youtube and you can hear players talking to each other strategising against the killer. This isn't how the game was designed to be played.  Developers have done nothing to address this.  The player base can be pretty toxic.   Read some of the discussions on Reddit and other forums before you spend money on this. They need to focus on how to build a better player base to make this more enjoyable.  The good: the game is pretty addictive and you will come across some people who are fun to play with.  The music, artwork and jumpscares are where this game shines.  If you're a horror fan you should give it a shot.

When i first knew of this game because of the stranger things dlc, my friends persuaded me to buy the game, at first i did not knew what to do, until i've learnt the mechanics the hard way.
The hit box in this game is so damn inconsistent, and wonky at times. I got hit by the huntress when i was not even close to 3m away, and at times i can get away with a hit that seemingly hit me.
Graphics wise - very spec friendly, learning curve tends to be challenged against new players
